CustomField.formula: TRIM( IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_1__c)), Medication_1__c, "" ) & IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_1__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_2__c)) ), ", ", "" ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_2__c)), Medication_2__c, "" ) & IF( AND( OR( NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_1__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_2__c)) ), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_3__c)) ), ", ", "" ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_3__c)), Medication_3__c, "" ) & IF( AND( OR( NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_1__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_2__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_3__c)) ), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_4__c)) ), ", ", "" ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_4__c)), Medication_4__c, "" ) & IF( AND( OR( NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_1__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_2__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_3__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_4__c)) ), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_5__c)) ), ", ", "" ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_5__c)), Medication_5__c, "" ) & IF( AND( OR( NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_1__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_2__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_3__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_4__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_5__c)) ), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_6__c)) ), ", ", "" ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_6__c)), Medication_6__c, "" ) & IF( AND( OR( NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_1__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_2__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_3__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_4__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_5__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_6__c)) ), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_7__c)) ), ", ", "" ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_7__c)), Medication_7__c, "" ) & IF( AND( OR( NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_1__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_2__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_3__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_4__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_5__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_6__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_7__c)) ), NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_8__c)) ), ", ", "" ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Medication_8__c)), Medication_8__c, "" ) )
CustomField.label: Medications
